name: Viet nam
startIntroPart1: Vietnam has the right to be a free and independent countryâ€”and in fact it is so already. And thus the entire Vietnamese people are determined to mobilize all their physical and mental strength, to sacrifice their lives and property in order to safeguard their independence and liberty.
declaringWar: Vietnamese people love peace, but all of us are willing to fight for our Fatherland!
attacked: We would rather sacrifice everything than lose our country, definitely refuse to be slaves!
defeated: Viet Nam doc lap thong nhat muon nam!
introduction: Hello, I'm Ho Chi Minh, the leader of Vietnam.
afterPeace: The war is over. We should look to the future.
